captions.text: There are no strings on me!
Why you gotta make Pinocchio sound scary?
A dream is a wish your heart makes!
I can show you the world!
Do you want to build a snowman!
We heard you're going up against the avengers.
You've got a friend in meeee.

comments.text:
Ideas for 'The Avengers: Age of Ultron' Hishe. Quicksilver repositions all 
the bullets shot at the Scarlett Witch instead of letting them hit him. 
Magneto & the X-men turn up to help defeat Ultron (building on their 
victory of defeating the robot sentinel army & the futuristic 
mystique-sentinels). Quicksilver explains that he's superhumanly fast 
enough to be in two movie franchises at once (Avengers & X-men).  Alt 
endings Ultron stays in computer virus form & goes all SkyNet apocalypse & 
then ends up victories in the villain pub. Alt ending Magneto turns up just 
at the right time to save Quicksilver & Wanda from the bullets & proceeds 
to save the day by magnetizing all the ultron units thus destroying their 
circuitry.﻿

comments.text:
-There are no strings on me (Pinocchio)
- A dream is a wish your heart makes (Cinderella)
- I can show you the world, Shining Shimmering Splendid (Aladdin)
- Hakuna Matata (The Lion King)
- Do you want to build a snowman (Frozen)
- You've got a friend in me (Toy Story)

Nice one :) I hope you guys do more of this Ultron ruin Disney Film﻿

comments.text:
SUPER HUGE SPOILER ALERT!!!

ONLY READ IF YOU'VE ALREADY SEEN MOVIE!!!









The reason the vision could lift Thors' hammer is because he IS worthy.

The vision is just regular skin tissue bonded to vibranium. The vision is 
NOT a robot, he's a synthetic human made of vibranium, and given some extra 
powers for no particular reason because movie plot.

Also iron man couldn't lift it even though he was in his armor even though 
it was technically a Machine trying to lift it. Which means that The Vision 
is worthy to use Thor's hammer 
﻿
